input: How many loan contracts have been extended and have their final payment date set in the future?

output.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LoanContractProlongationRequest AS T1 JOIN LoanContract AS T2 ON T1.LoanContract = T2.ID WHERE T1.LifeCycleStatusCode = '5' AND T1.LoanContractProlongationTermValidityEndDate > CURRENT_DATE;
